title: Reclamation
description: Desperate to survive the invasion, Cade and I are forced into situations we never imagined possible.Danger lurks around every corner, and new people enter our lives as we struggle to stay alive. Survival means we must all make a choice… continue to hide or make a stand.But all choices have consequences, and they lead to roads we never thought we'd travel—roads that may divide us in the end.Sacrifices will be made, not everyone will survive, and one question drives us all; who will prevail... mankind or the aliens?Find out how it all ends in the thrilling conclusion to the Ravening series.
author: Erica Stevens
